## Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] Bash scripts use proper quoting and error handling

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README, CONTRIBUTING, etc.)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments where needed
- [ ] Generated documentation (AGENTS.md, CLAUDE.md) is correct

### Testing

- [ ] I have tested on at least 2 different languages (or N/A)
- [ ] I have tested with at least 2 different AI assistants (or N/A)
- [ ] Install script works from scratch
- [ ] All playbooks execute correctly
- [ ] No regressions in existing functionality

### Git

- [ ] My commits follow conventional commit format
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] I have rebased on latest main (no merge conflicts)
